mapper.select: select code from stockcode order by code asc
select c.*, i.* from stockcode c, stockdinfo i where c.code = i.code and i.code=#{code} and rownum <=200
select c.name, i.* , c.totalstock from stockcode c, stockdinfo i where c.code = i.code and day>=#{day} order by c.code asc, i.day desc
